name: Acheman (Autoghost)
author: ywkls
info: A large, flying enemy based on the Acheman.
description: Creates a 4 x 3 enemy, which flies about the room. At times, it stops and shoots fireballs that follow you for an extended period of time. At times, it stops moving and sheilds itself from damage.
setup: Create the 4 x 3 enemy.Create 6 combos in this order:1. Firing, facing left.2. Firing, facing right.3. Flying, facing left.4. Flying, facing right.5. Shielded, facing left.6. Shielded, facing right.Requires- std.zh, string.zh, ghost.zh.
